msbt.message: Hi, ! I heard a real cool rumor about you, .
Hi, ! I heard a real cool rumor about you, .

You're gonna make famous so K.K. will perform here, yeah?I used to think K.K. was singing just to me whenever I wanted, but then I figured out how recordings work.I really want to see him in person. I'll be cheering for you!

Maaaaaaan, I've got an idea!Since a concert's gonna happen, let's have a place where folks can take a break. It'll be like this"Whew! I'm tuckered out from all this concerting! I sure could drink a juice and eat a snack and rest my feet!"Any time juice and snacks and K.K. are all happening all at once, in the same place, I'm a happy !
I'll let you know if I find something that'll be good for a rest spot.You got a lotta stuff in your pockets. You should find a good spot to set some of it down and rest!
Ooh, I know! Here, take this.
This is perfect for a rest-spot decoration!
Hey, ! Are you getting ready for K.K.'s concert, ?

I'll let ya know if I find, like, a JUICE 'N SNACKS sign with big neon-green letters and maybe a clown picture.Oh, I just noticed your pocket deal. You're carrying WAY too much stuff! Careful, you'll hurt your back!
I found something that oughta be put in the resting spot, probably. Here ya go!
I found something that should be put in the resting spot. Here ya go!
This is perfect for a resting-spot decoration!
That was made in my hometown.With it around, I'd get to smell the smells of home, but on this island! That'd feel nice, .
Here's a recipe for the perfect resting-spot thing. It's a recipe for... .Handmade stuff makes me feel all warm and fuzzy. Like getting stuck in my blankets, but without the panic.
